page.title: 07ANDREW LLOYD WEBBER,COMPOSER
page.content:
SYDMONTON COURT, FOR VERY MANY YEARS THE HOME OF THE KINGSMILL FAMILY, NOW BELONGS TO THE COMPOSER ANDREW LLOYD WEBBER. FROM A MUSICAL FAMILY,- HIS BROTHER JULIAN IS A WELL KNOWN CELLIST - HE FIRST BECAME FAMOUS WITH THE MUSICAL STAGE SHOW "JOSEPH AND HIS AMAZING TECHNICOLOUR DREAMCOAT", WHICH HE HAD STARTED WORK ON WHILST STILL AT SCHOOL. THIS WAS IN 1968 AND SINCE THAT TIME HE HAS HAD A LARGE NUMBER OF SUCCESSES INCLUDING "EVITA" A MUSICAL BASED ON THE LIFE OF EVA PERON, AND "CATS" ANOTHER MUSICAL, WHICH MAKES USE OF T.S.ELIOT'S POETRY.
BECAUSE OF THE NATURE OF HIS WORK, HE INEVITABLY HAS TO SPEND A LOT OF TIME AWAY FROM HOME AND SO HAS NOT BECOME VERY INVOLVED IN THE LIFE OF THE AREA.
